title: Cats, Tomorrow's Ink

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: **Fade into Forever** — Investigate a player each night. The host will find the best image or piece of art that they can with a reasonable amount of effort that depicts your target's role and, if possible, them doing what they're doing tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your last will is automatically updated with your targets and images at all times, including your result on the night you die.
- You can't have your role or will obscured or edited upon death by any means.

desc:
Post 2057
*Maybe something’s missing in this overcast heart.*
